subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees buried the Kansas City Royals on Tuesday for their 11th victory in 14 games and are just four and a half games behind the Cleveland Indians for the lead in the wild-card race.
snippet: The Yankees buried the Kansas City Royals on Tuesday for their 11th victory in 14 games and are just four and a half games behind the Cleveland Indians for the lead in the wild-card race.
